name: Yellowjacket (Michael)
description:
* There is a known issue with the final boss in the Browser version. Please try the Windows version for the full experience! And good luck! *

In a world full of dangerous clans, the Yellowjacket were known to be especially violent. Conquering the lands through brutal wars of aggression, until the Queen changed direction, and turned to more peaceful methods. A change not everyone agreed with, nor believed...

After an expedition into the outlands surrounding their territories, the young Princess returns to find her clan decimated and her mother missing. With a thirst for vengence, and nothing to lose, the Princess knows she must return to the ways of forebearers.

Signs lead the Princess to venture to the lands of the Arachniss, a formerly neutral Kingdom, where everything seems hostile. Troubled by the recent events, the Princess explores the Kingdom of Arachniss to find any traces of her mother...

Public Repohttps://github.com/Kkachi-io/Yellowjacket-Public
